permissions.name: View Dashboard
permissions.description: Allow access to view the admin dashboard with analytics and overview

permissions.name: View Users
permissions.description: Allow viewing user profiles and user management list

permissions.name: Create Users
permissions.description: Allow creating new user accounts

permissions.name: Edit Users
permissions.description: Allow editing existing user information and profiles

permissions.name: Delete Users
permissions.description: Allow deleting user accounts

permissions.name: View Kitchens
permissions.description: Allow viewing kitchen profiles and kitchen management list

permissions.name: Create Kitchens
permissions.description: Allow adding new kitchens to the platform

permissions.name: Edit Kitchens
permissions.description: Allow editing kitchen information, dishes, and settings

permissions.name: Delete Kitchens
permissions.description: Allow removing kitchens from the platform

permissions.name: View Partners
permissions.description: Allow viewing partner profiles and partner management list

permissions.name: Create Partners
permissions.description: Allow adding new partners to the platform

permissions.name: Edit Partners
permissions.description: Allow editing partner information and settings

permissions.name: Delete Partners
permissions.description: Allow removing partners from the platform

permissions.name: View Feedback
permissions.description: Allow viewing customer feedback and reviews

permissions.name: Manage Feedback
permissions.description: Allow responding to and managing customer feedback

permissions.name: View Customers
permissions.description: Allow viewing customer profiles and customer list

permissions.name: Edit Customers
permissions.description: Allow editing customer information and profiles

permissions.name: Delete Customers
permissions.description: Allow removing customer accounts

permissions.name: View Discounts
permissions.description: Allow viewing discount campaigns and promotions

permissions.name: Create Discounts
permissions.description: Allow creating new discount campaigns and promotions

permissions.name: Edit Discounts
permissions.description: Allow editing existing discount campaigns

permissions.name: Delete Discounts
permissions.description: Allow removing discount campaigns

permissions.name: View Settings
permissions.description: Allow viewing system settings and configurations

permissions.name: Edit Settings
permissions.description: Allow modifying system settings and configurations

permissions.name: View Orders
permissions.description: Allow viewing order history and order management

permissions.name: Edit Orders
permissions.description: Allow editing order details and status

permissions.name: Cancel Orders
permissions.description: Allow canceling orders and processing refunds

permissions.name: View Engagement
permissions.description: Allow viewing engagement center and communication tools

permissions.name: Send Communications
permissions.description: Allow sending broadcast messages and notifications

permissions.name: View Reports
permissions.description: Allow viewing analytics reports and business intelligence

permissions.name: Export Reports
permissions.description: Allow exporting reports and data for external analysis

permissions.name: View Roles
permissions.description: Allow viewing roles and permission management

permissions.name: Create Roles
permissions.description: Allow creating new roles with specific permissions

permissions.name: Edit Roles
permissions.description: Allow editing existing roles and their permissions

permissions.name: Delete Roles
permissions.description: Allow removing roles from the system
